# Drop-Down Cart for Woocommerce
![Image of Cart](images/drop-down-cart.gif)


## Tutorial
1. Oxygen → Templates → Add New Reusable Part  
2. Add title `Drop-Down Cart`  
3. Click on ``+Shortcodes`` and insert:
    ```
    [ct_div_block_4 ct_sign_sha256='123' ct_options='{"ct_id":1,"ct_parent":0,"selector":"div_block-4-75","original":{"position":"absolute","z-index":"1","custom-js":"","custom-css":"Ym94LXNoYWRvdzogMCAzcHggNXB4IDFweCByZ2JhKDAsMCwwLC4xKTs=","background-color":"#ffffff","flex-direction":"unset","padding-right":"15","padding-left":"15","padding-top":"15","padding-bottom":"15","border-radius":"4","text-align":"left","width":"275","top-unit":"%","top":"100","right-unit":"%","right":"0"},"activeselector":"drop-down-cart-content","classes":{"0":"drop-down-cart-content"}}'][ct_widget ct_sign_sha256='123' ct_options='{"ct_id":2,"ct_parent":1,"selector":"widget-8-75","original":{"class_name":"WC_Widget_Cart","id_base":"woocommerce_widget_cart","pretty_name":"Cart","instance":{"title":"","_ajax_linking_nonce":"ZWJlM2QxOGFjMQ==","hide_if_empty":false},"paramsBase64":true,"flex-direction":"column","width":"100","display":"flex"},"ct_widget":"true","nicename":"Cart (#19)","activeselector":false}'][/ct_widget][ct_code_block ct_sign_sha256='123' ct_options='{"ct_id":3,"ct_parent":1,"selector":"code_block-9-75","original":{"code-css":"","code-php":"","flex-direction":"unset","display":"none","visibility":"hidden"},"activeselector":false}'][/ct_code_block][/ct_div_block_4]
    ```
4. Save
5. Go to your Page, Add → Reusable → `Drop-Down Cart`
